script_text:
Lily,today is the last day of school.Where are you going in
your winter vacation?
I'm going to Harbin with my parents.I don't like cold weather.
I'm afraid of getting a cold.
Oh,you'll be fine.What are you going to do there?
We're going to see ice lanterns and play in the snow.My
uncle's family live there.We're going to visit them.
Are you going to ski?
Yes.I can't ski now,but I'm going to have skiing lessons.
OK,have a nice winter vacation!
You too!I'm going to bring back some sausages for you!I hear
they are famous in Harbin.
Thank you.

engine_raw.gemini_feedback: 学生整体发音基础扎实，单词辨识度很高。主要的发音习惯问题在于：1. 咬舌音 /ð/ 掌握不牢，容易用齿龈音替代；2. 朗读节奏较为平均，缺乏对话中的情感起伏和意群停顿。建议加强连读练习，并模仿原声中的升降调。
engine_raw.detected_transcript: Lily, today is the last day of school. Where are you going in your winter vacation? I'm going to Harbin with my parents. I don't like cold wetter. I'm afraid of getting a cold. Oh, you'll be fine. What are you going to do there? We're going to see ice lanterns and play in the snow. My uncle's family live there. We're going to visit them. Are you going to ski? Yes. I can't ski now, but I'm going to have skiing lessons. OK, have a nice winter vacation! You too! I'm going to bring back some sausages for you! I hear they are famous in Harbin. Thank you.

conflict_details.comment: 注意 'th' 的咬舌动作，现在听起来像 'wetter'。

integrated_feedback.overall_comment: 同学，你的声音非常悦耳且自信！你完整地完成了整段对话，大部分单词的发音都非常标准，尤其是像 'sausages' 这样复杂的词也读得很好。如果你能把语调变得更像在和朋友聊天，那就完美了。
specific_suggestions: 把 'weather' 最后的 'th' 发得更地道：舌尖轻轻顶住上齿龈下方，让气流摩擦而出。
在读 'Where are you going...' 时，尝试把 'going in your' 连起来，不要断开。
practice_tips: 对着镜子练习 /ð/ 音，确保能看到舌尖露出。
录下自己的声音并与原声对比，重点听句子末尾的升降调。
integrated_feedback.fun_challenge: 试着模仿‘哈尔滨导游’的语气，用更兴奋的声音读出 'see ice lanterns and play in the snow' 这一句！

top_errors.description: 将 'weather' 中的浊辅音 /ð/ 读成了类似 /t/ 或 /d/ 的音，识别为 'wetter'。
top_errors.improvement: 练习咬舌音。发 /ð/ 时，舌尖必须轻轻伸出并置于上下齿之间，让气流通过，同时声带振动。

top_errors.description: 断句略显生硬，部分句子呈现‘单词跳跃’感，缺乏自然的连读和语调起伏。
words: Where are you going in your winter vacation?
I'm going to Harbin with my parents.
top_errors.improvement: 尝试意群（Thought Groups）练习，不要一个词一个词地蹦，而是把 'in your winter vacation' 作为一个整体读出。

hesitations.desc: 检测到了一些填充词。尝试用停顿代替它们。
tips: 在想说什么的时候，试着深呼吸而不是发出'嗯'的声音。
尝试放慢语速，给自己更多思考时间。

completeness.title: 完整度分析
completeness.insight: 内容覆盖率: 100% (漏读 0 个关键词)
tips: 完美！你没有漏掉任何单词。
